member.name: IQueryContinue.QueryContinue
member.summary: Returns S_OK if the operation associated with the current instance of this interface should continue.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if the calling application should continue, S_FALSE if not.

member.name: IQueryContinue
member.summary: Exposes a method that provides a simple, standard mechanism for objects to query a client for permission to continue an operation. Clients of , for example, must pass an implementation of IQueryContinue to the method.
